message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this valuable product. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.  I'm asking for $18,000 to start negotiations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is closer to its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still unable to pay more than $12,000 for the product. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,500?
